statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -11 \\ 3 \\ -7 \\ 12 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ -13 \\ -7 \\ 1 \\ 6 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
